attributes.action: Real Life Skills in Secondary Education
attributes.additional_details:
We are year 11 students at King Ethelbert School and as part of our Citizenship coursework we are working towards the goal of getting more real life skills taught within schools. Skills such as: First Aid, Cooking, and Practical Life Skills. These are just some of the few skills we feel should be prioritised in all schools. We believe this as, these skills will help young people transition into the work place and life. These skills are essential for young people to become integrated into society.
Please show your support by signing this petition.
